extendedInfo.description: Locate the burger places closest to you.  Uses GPS and the Very Near Here database to find the 25 closest burger joints to where you are standing.   Features* Larger phone number with 1-touch loading to dialer.* Brings up website for location if site is listed.* Shows distance from current location.We are still in beta.   Please let us know how we can improve the app via our contact us form at www.verynearhere.com.Tags:burgers, burger finder, burger locator, burger joints, burger places

reviews.title: simple and useful
reviews.comment: Great app for charleston.  Can\'t wait for more cities to come online!
reviews.author: A Google User
